entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Temperature rising to plus 5 by morning. POP 60%

entry.title: Thursday: Mainly cloudy. High 6.

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow or rain. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Rain beginning near midnight then changing to snow. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming light in the evening. Low minus 1. Wind chill minus 5 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Wednesday 25 January 2023
